Description: On I-95 at mile marker 139.4 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 4 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south exit ramp narrows.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 246.7 in the County of James City, near Lee Hall, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 36.8 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east left shoulder, left lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
